title: Perry Pushes Back Against Allegations He Overstepped His Authority
teaser: Tess Vigeland talks to Ben Philpott of member station KUT about the indictment of Texas Gov. Rick Perry on charges of abuse of power. The governor spoke for the first time since the charges, saying he acted within his power.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
